description.originalText: Kathy took care of my mother for several years . Kathy is very conscientious and intelligent. She took care of my mother for several years until her death

description.displayText: Kathy was pleasant and on time. She took directions well for the most part. However, I don't deem her to be a safe worker. I notified her of my mom being prone to falls and on two occasions my mother was in an uncomfortable sliding position where she could have slid to the floor. I also noted she did not engage with my mom much. My mom has late stage dementia. What I look for in a caregiver in particular at that stage is that they are attentive and solution oriented since my mom is not able to communicate her needs. I think she left with us both knowing it was not a good fit.
description.originalText: Kathy was pleasant and on time. She took directions well for the most part. However, I don't deem her to be a safe worker. What I look for in a caregiver in particular at that stage is that they are attentive and solution oriented since my mom is not able to communicate her needs. I think she left with us both knowing it was not a good fit.

description.displayText: Kathy provided incredible care to my great-aunt when she was in her 90s, and I would recommend her to anyone. Kathy is kind, thoughtful, and incredibly patient. She showed impeccable judgment and problem-solving skills, anticipated challenges, and did all of her work with great sensitivity--not only toward my great-aunt but also toward everyone in my great-aunt's life. She was utterly dependable and went above and beyond our expectations on a regular basis. My great-aunt adored Kathy, and so did the rest of us. Any individual or family would be lucky to work with Kathy.
description.originalText: Kathy provided incredible care to my great-aunt when she was in her 90s, and I would recommend her to anyone. Kathy is kind, thoughtful, and incredibly patient. She showed impeccable judgment and problem-solving skills, anticipated challenges, and did all of her work with great sensitivity--not only toward my great-aunt but also toward everyone in my great-aunt's life. She was utterly dependable and went above and beyond our expectations on a regular basis. My great-aunt adored Kathy, and so did the rest of us. Any individual or family would be lucky to work with Kathy.

description.displayText:
Kathy took care of both my mother and Aunt. Kathy cared for my mother for 3 and a half years and my aunt for 6 months.
 Kathy is extremely professional. Kathy is knowledgeable and responsible. Kathy is caring and compassionate.
 Kathy goes above and beyond what is required of her. She listens to the needs of her client
and pays close attention to detail. Kathy caters to the whole person and genuinely cares about them. This is 
more than a job for Kathy, it is a calling. 
 I highly recommend her. You could not find a better person to care for your loved one. Kathy is truly a 10 out of 10!

description.displayText: Kathy is a very loving and intelligent individual. She assisted my mom and enabled her to stay in her home for several years. As my mom grew increasingly frail she was blanked to make very insightful and sound adjustments in her care. As a family we indeed were fortunate to have Kathy in our lives. In addition I observed Kathy interact with the children of neighbors as well as my own. They really took great pleasure in any time she c spent with them. She would be an excellent addition to your staff.

description.displayText: Kathy provided supportive care for my dad and cared for him when he could not care for himself. She is strong, kind and dependable.
description.originalText: Kathy provided supportive care for my dad and cared for him when he could not care for himself. She is strong, kind and dependable.

description.displayText: Kathy is contentious and caring. She always has a smile and is a good worker. I'm grateful to her.
